message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how it goes from here!
You started with a 50/50 offer, so I'm offering a slight bias towards myself, let's see if you'll take it!
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fairer split considering the original 50/50 start.
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you!
I'm willing to meet you halfway and give you a slightly larger share, but I think this is the maximum I can offer without sacrificing my own gain too much.
You're being stubborn, let's go back to the original 50/50 split. I'm not getting any younger!
